name: SUS(AD Game Jam)
description:
Somethings Up in Space and you need to find out the murder of a dead crewmate indicating there's an Imposter AmogSus . Gather Information From Other crewmates cross check their story to find out who is the Imposter and also he/she might chase you in between while sabotaging so BEWARE ! and  BEQUICK ! cause who knows what dark deep secret lies in that ship.

HOW TO PLAY 

1. Take A note of Every Crewmate Positions Before the Real Imposter Sabotages

2. Check Your Tablet For Task To Be Done In Sabotage And More Important The Position Of the Imposter (If Danger Signal Maxes You Will Die) So avoid Him At Any Cost

3. Call The Emergency Meeting Before 6:00 Or the Imposter will roam Free Forever

4. Imposter Hunt Begins Every After 00:40 min diff
